channel.title: Power Losses - T햇햇
channel.description: Recent content in Power Losses on T햇햇

item.title: Simulation of sinusoidal voltage inverter using reducing switching losses PWM strategy
item.description: The article examines the work of a converter that synthesizes sinusoidal voltage supply to the active-inductive load through method of controlled high-frequency pulses with sinusoidal pulse-width modulation.
